RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.label: Endoanaleptics Wait
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.description: If using healing vore, this pawn will wait for endoanaleptics supplements before treating their prey
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledManually: Currently allowed to treat prey even without endoanaleptics supplements.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledManually: Currently not allowed to treat prey without endoanaleptics supplements.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledAutomatically: Currently allowed to treat prey even without endoanaleptics supplements.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledAutomatically: Currently not allowed to treat prey without endoanaleptics supplements.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipBlocked: This tip should not appear, so hopefully you aren't seeing this.
